title: "Curry <br> 咖喱"
categories: [Chicken, Beef, Pork]
image: ./Images/curry.jpg
---

### 🥣 Ingredients | 用料

| Ingredient | 用料 | Amount | 份量 |
|------------|------|--------|------|
| Protein of choice (chicken, beef, etc.) | 蛋白质（鸡肉、牛肉） | 200 g | 200克 |
| Curry roux block | 咖喱块 | 50 g | 50克 |
| Milk | 牛奶 | 50 ml | 50毫升 |
| Potato | 土豆 | 1  | 一个 |
| Carrot | 胡萝卜 | 1  | 一根 |
| Onion | 洋葱 | Half | 半颗 |

### 🍴 Steps | 步骤
1. Cut the meat, carrot, potato, and onion into chunks. (Onion slightly larger pieces)  
 将肉、胡萝卜、土豆、洋葱切块。（洋葱切大点）
2. Heat oil in a pot and stir-fry all the ingredients until partially cooked.  
 锅中热油，放入食材翻炒到食材断生。
3. Add enough water to just cover the ingredients. Once boiling, reduce to low heat and simmer for 20 minutes.  
 锅中加水莫过食材，水沸后转小火焖煮20分钟。
4. Add the curry block and stir until fully dissolved.  
 加入咖喱块搅拌至完全融化。
5. Turn up the heat, add milk, and simmer until the sauce thickens. Serve.  
 开大火并加入牛奶，收汁后出锅。
